total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the row that contains all 1s in the input grid.
Q2: Identify the pattern above the row of 1s in the input grid.
Q3: Identify the pattern below the row of 1s in the input grid.
Q4: Swap the patterns identified in Q2 and Q3.
Q5: Replace the number 2 with 3 in the swapped pattern.
Q6: Replace the number 8 with 4 in the swapped pattern.
